page.title: 08Industry-service employmnent
page.content: Firms inside the Santa Fe depot include an electronics instruments factory (Status instruments employing 15 people),Colt engineering (employing 6 people),a printer (employing 3 people),and an American tyre distributor specialising in large commercial tyres (Bandag U.S.A. employing 3 people). {UNEMPLOYMENT }is high throughout the country and such small scale schemes are being encouraged by the ruling Conservative Party led by Margaret Thatcher.Unemployment is particularly high amongst the young and unskilled.School leavers who are unable to find employment are able to develop skills through Government sponsored and financed work schemes. This part of Gloucestershire has not been so adversely affected by the economic recession as other counties.
